author: Oluwaseun A.
content: Great proposal! This blockchain-based digital identity system could be a game-changer for rural communities. Excited to see how it can improve access to financial services.

author: Chioma B.
content: I have some concerns about the scalability of this system. How will we ensure data privacy and security for vulnerable populations?

author: Mohammed K.
content: Impressive technical approach. The use of blockchain could significantly reduce bureaucratic barriers for rural communities.
